acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using MAX TV PRO services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

service.content: MAX TV PRO provides IPTV streaming services with 4K and HD quality content through licensed providers.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.item1: Use the service for personal, non-commercial purposes only
usage.item2: Do not share your account credentials with others
usage.item3: Do not attempt to circumvent or disable security features
usage.item4: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: All payments are processed securely. Subscriptions are billed in advance for the selected period. We accept major credit cards and secure payment methods.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violation of these terms. You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account or contact us for support.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process payments, and provide customer support.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Contact us at privacy@maxprotv.com for any privacy-related requests.

policy.title: No Refunds After Subscription
policy.content: All sales are final. No refunds or exchanges are provided after subscription activation. Please ensure you understand our service before purchasing.

conditions.title: Important Notice
conditions.item1: No refunds are provided after subscription activation
conditions.item2: No exchanges or credits are available
conditions.item3: All payments are final and non-refundable

internet-speed.question: What internet speed is recommended for 4K streaming?
internet-speed.answer: We recommend a stable 25 Mbps or higher for optimal 4K streaming experience. For HD content, 10 Mbps is sufficient.

activation-time.question: How long does activation take after payment?
activation-time.answer: Activation is instant! You will receive your login credentials within 1-2 minutes after successful payment.

device-limit.question: How many devices can I use simultaneously?
device-limit.answer: All plans include multi-device support. You can use up to 3 devices simultaneously with any subscription.

buffering-issues.question: What should I do if I experience buffering?
buffering-issues.answer: Check your internet connection, try a different server location in the app, or contact our 24/7 support team for assistance.

legal-content.question: Is the service legal and licensed?
legal-content.answer: Yes, all content is streamed from authorized sources through licensed providers. We do not host or distribute copyrighted content.

payment-methods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment-methods.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and cryptocurrency payments for your convenience.

refund-policy.question: What is your refund policy?
refund-policy.answer: We do not offer refunds or exchanges. All sales are final. We are committed to providing high-quality service and support.

technical-support.question: Do you provide technical support?
technical-support.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 technical support to help you with installation, setup, and any issues you may encounter.
